model_input.system_prompt:
# GAME: Colonel Blotto

## Goal
Two players simultaneously allocate 20 troops across three battlefields (A, B, C). Win two battlefields per round.

- Think privately in <think>...</think>, then ONLY output the action line.

### Output Format (Strict)
- ONLY output one line: `[Ax By Cz]` where x+y+z=20 and each ≥0.
- Do NOT include explanations or any extra text after </think>.
